title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)
descriptions:
**Title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Interactive AR-Powered Learning Experience**

**Description:**
Ignite your child's love for learning with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu! Designed for children aged 4-10 years, this 3-in-1 educational set is the ideal combination of fun and learning, providing an interactive experience that enhances math, vocabulary, and problem-solving skills through engaging augmented reality (AR) play.

**Key Features:**
- **Comprehensive Learning Kits:** Includes Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link, each focusing on key developmental areas including counting, arithmetic, linguistic abilities, and comprehension.
- **Innovative AR Technology:** Experience a hands-on approach to STEM education with AR-powered STEM kits that bring learning to life.
- **Adaptive Learning:** With 15 interactive games and over 750 levels, the Plugo app adapts to your child's learning pace, suitable for pre-K to Grade 4.
- **No In-App Purchases:** Enjoy a full learning experience with no additional costs; the Plugo app is free to download with no in-app purchases required.
- **Develops Essential Skills:** Watch your child enhance their fine-motor skills, problem-solving abilities, and STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, Mathematics) knowledge through play.
- **Compatibility:** Works with a wide range of devices including iOS (iPhone 6 & above, iPad 5th Gen & above, exceptions apply), Android (OS version 8 & above, 2GB RAM, front camera at the top center, screen size limitations), and Amazon Fire models (7 - 2022, 8 - 2018 & 2020, 8+ - 2020).
- **Easy Setup:** The pack includes a foldable gamepad with a device slot and embedded magnets, ensuring a secure and interactive play area.
- **Gift Suitability:** Perfect for both boys and girls, the Plugo STEM Pack is a thoughtful and impactful gift for birthdays, holidays, and special occasions.

**Package Contents:**
- 1 Plugo Count Kit
- 1 Plugo Letters Kit
- 1 Plugo Link Kit
- 1 Foldable Gamepad with Device Slot (Device not included)

**App Details:**
- Name: Plugo by PlayShifu
- Availability: Free on the App Store and Play Store
- In-App Purchases: None

Jumpstart your child's journey into the world of STEM with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu. It's not just a toy; it's an adventure into the foundations of a lifelong passion for learning and discovery. Order now and watch your child's imagination and intellect soar!

**Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Interactive AR-Powered Learning Kits**

Unlock the world of interactive learning for your child with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu, an engaging collection of AR-powered STEM kits designed to foster essential skills in children aged 4 to 10. Whether it's for a birthday, holiday, or just because, this 3-in-1 pack is the perfect gift to stimulate young minds and introduce them to the fundamentals of math, engineering, and linguistics.

**Product Highlights:**

- **Comprehensive Learning System**: Includes three innovative kits - Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link - each focused on a different educational area.
- **STEM Education Focus**: Engages children in learning math, vocabulary, puzzles, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills through play.
- **Wide Compatibility**: Works with a variety of devices including iPhone 6 & above, iPad 5th Gen & above (except iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9”), Android devices with OS version 8 & above, 2GB RAM, and front camera at the top centre (screen size limitations apply), and Amazon Fire models 7 - 2022, 8 - 2018 & 2020, 8+ - 2020.
- **Interactive Learning**: 15 interactive games with over 750 levels that adapt from Pre-K to Grade 4, ensuring the challenge grows with your child's abilities.
- **No Hidden Costs**: The Plugo app is available on both the App Store and Play Store with no additional in-app purchases required.
- **Inclusive Design**: Suitable for both boys and girls, supporting an inclusive learning environment.
- **Box Contents**: Each pack contains 3 Plugo kits (Count, Link, and Letters), and 1 Plugo Gamepad with a foldable mat and embedded magnets. Note: The device is not included.

**Engaging Features:**

- **Diverse Learning Outcome**: Your child can master counting, arithmetic, linguistic comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills, all while having fun.
- **No In-App Purchases**: The Plugo app is free to download and contains no hidden costs, ensuring uninterrupted learning experiences.
- **Device-Check Ready**: Check device compatibility using the PlayShifu website compatibility dashboard before purchasing.
- **Skills Development**: With a STEAM focus on math, engineering, and linguistic abilities, the Plugo STEM Pack nurtures a well-rounded skill set.

**Easy to Use:**

1. Choose your compatible device and download the Plugo app from the App Store or Play Store.
2. Insert the device into the gamepad slot.
3. Start playing with any of the Plugo Count, Letters, or Link kits to begin the interactive learning adventure.

Your child will be captivated by the magic of AR as they dive into a world of engaging educational content, all while developing the critical thinking and problem-solving skills that are vital for future success. Get the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu today and watch your child's love for learning grow!

**Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3-in-1)**

Unlock the full potential of at-home learning with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu, the innovative AR-powered educational experience designed for children aged 4 to 10 years. This comprehensive 3-in-1 STEM pack includes the Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link kits, providing an exciting hands-on approach to math, vocabulary, and problem-solving.

**Product Features:**

- **Educational Focus:** Delve into an array of subjects with a focus on Math, Vocabulary, Puzzles, Problem-Solving, and Fine-Motor Skills. The Plugo STEM Pack caters to an age range of 4-10 years, offering adaptive learning suitable from Pre-K to Grade 4.
- **Compatibility:** Seamlessly integrates with a range of devices, including iOS (iPhone 6 & above, iPad 5th Gen & above, except iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9”), Android (OS version 8 & above, 2GB RAM, front camera at the top center, not supporting screens 10 inches & above), and Amazon Fire (7 - 2022, 8 - 2018 & 2020, 8+ - 2020). Check PlayShifu's compatibility dashboard for a hassle-free setup.
- **Interactive Learning:** With 15 interactive games and over 750 levels, children can enjoy a variety of challenges that foster counting, arithmetic, linguistic abilities, comprehension, and problem-solving skills without any in-app purchases.
- **Package Contents:** The pack includes 1 Plugo Count kit, 1 Plugo Letters kit, 1 Plugo Link kit, and 1 foldable gamepad with a device slot and embedded magnets (device not included).
- **App Availability:** The free Plugo app is available on both the App Store and Play Store, ensuring easy access to all the educational content and games.
- **Gift Suitability:** An ideal gift for both boys and girls, the Plugo STEM Pack is designed to engage young minds and introduce them to the core STEM and STEAM concepts through play.
- **STEM & STEAM Focus:** By integrating math and engineering with linguistic abilities, children develop a holistic understanding of these essential disciplines.

**Learning Outcomes:**

- Develop counting and arithmetic skills through interactive Plugo Count games.
- Enhance vocabulary and linguistic comprehension with Plugo Letters.
- Foster engineering and problem-solving abilities with the construction challenges in Plugo Link.
- Improve fine-motor skills with tactile play using magnetic blocks.

The Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu is your child's passport to a world where learning meets fun. No additional costs, no in-app purchases, just endless educational adventures at your fingertips. Set your child on the path to success and watch as they explore, learn, and grow with the Plugo STEM Pack.

**Unlock the World of Learning with Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu**

Introduce your child to a magical learning experience with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu. Designed for curious minds aged 4 to 10 years, this pack is a gateway to immersive learning that blends physical play with digital technology.

**Engaging and Educational Components:**
- **Plugo Count:** Cultivate a love for numbers and arithmetic through engaging story-based challenges.
- **Plugo Letters:** Enhance vocabulary and spelling skills with interactive word-building puzzles.
- **Plugo Link:** Foster engineering and problem-solving abilities using magnetic blocks to construct and solve puzzles.

**Learn Through Play:**
- **Educational Focus:** A perfect blend of fun and education, this pack targets crucial skills such as counting, arithmetic, linguistic abilities, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills.
- **STEM Focus:** Dive into the core areas of Math and Engineering while enhancing linguistic abilities.
- **Interactive Experience:** With 15 interactive games and over 750 levels, the Plugo app engages children in progressive education from Pre-K to Grade 4.
- **Adaptive Learning:** The app's content adapts to your child's progress, ensuring a personalized learning journey.

**Device Compatibility:**
- **iOS:** Compatible with iPhone 6 & above, iPad 5th Gen & above (excluding iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9”).
- **Android:** Requires OS version 8 & above, 2GB RAM, and the front camera positioned at the top centre. (Note: Devices with a screen size of 10 inches & above are not supported).
- **Amazon Fire:** Compatible with Fire 7 - 2022, Fire 8 - 2018 & 2020, and Fire 8+ - 2020.

**Hassle-Free Setup:**
- **Gamepad Included:** A foldable mat with a device slot and embedded magnets is included for immediate play.
- **App Availability:** Download the free Plugo app from the App Store or Play Store with no additional in-app purchases.
- **Device Not Included:** Please note that a compatible device is required to use this product.

**Gift of Learning:**
- Whether for a birthday, holiday, or just because, the Plugo STEM Pack is an ideal gift for both boys and girls that will keep them entertained while providing educational value.

**What's in the Box?**
- 3 Plugo kits: Count, Letters, and Link
- 1 Plugo Gamepad
- (Note: Device not included)

Bring home the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu today and watch your child embark on a journey of discovery, fun, and learning. Visit the PlayShifu website compatibility dashboard to ensure your device is compatible and get ready for an adventure in STEM!
